title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 500.4 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 500.4 - Severability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall be severable, and if any
item, subclause, clause, sentence, subparagraph, paragraph, subdivision, section, or subpart of this Part, or the applicability thereof to any person or
circumstances, shall be adjudged by any court of competent jurisdiction to be
invalid, such judgment shall not affect, impair or invalidate the remainder
thereof, nor the application thereof, but shall be confined in its operation to
the item, subclause, clause, sentence, subparagraph, paragraph, subdivision, section, or subpart thereof, or to the person or circumstance directly involved
in the controversy in which such judgment shall have been
rendered. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
500.4

Adopted

New

York State Register September 11, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 37, eff. 9/22/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
